alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 29 at 10:15AM CDT until May 03 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River at Harwood affecting Cass County. Pembina River at Neche affecting Pembina County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sheyenne River at Harwood. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 86.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 85.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM CDT Saturday was 85.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Monday evening and continue falling to 81.6 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 84.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
